LOOPS - Uses counters and mappings for O(1) operations HOW IT WORKS: 1. Users predict winning team (free, once per season) 2. Contract tracks predictor count per team 3. When season ends, owner marks winning team 4. Winners claim their share: (pool / predictorCount) 5. NO loops needed - all O(1) operations","errors":{"OwnableInvalidOwner(address)":[{"details":"The owner is not a valid owner account. declareWinner(uint256).details: Owner calls this once season is settled by GameEngine

fundPrizePool(uint256,uint256).details: Anyone can fund, typically BettingPool sends 2% of revenue

returns.counts: Array of predictor counts per team (index = teamId)

returns._0: teamId Team predicted (0-19), or type(uint256).max if no prediction
teamId Winning team (0-19), or type(uint256).max if not declared

makePrediction(uint256).details: Can only predict before round 1 starts (during round 0)

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

withdrawUnclaimedPrize(uint256,address).details: Only callable if no winners or after sufficient time passed

canClaimPrize(uint256,address).notice: Check if user can claim prize and how much

declareWinner(uint256).notice: Declare winning team after season completes

fundPrizePool(uint256,uint256).notice: Fund prize pool for a season (called by BettingPool)

getSeasonPrizePool(uint256).notice: Get prize pool for a season

getSeasonStats(uint256).notice: Get prediction statistics for a season

getTeamPredictorCount(uint256,uint256).notice: Get number of predictors for a team

getUserPrediction(uint256,address).notice: Get user's prediction for a season

getWinningTeam(uint256).notice: Get winning team for a season

hasClaimed(uint256,address).notice: Claimed status per user per season

makePrediction(uint256).notice: Make a free prediction for season winner

seasonWinningTeam(uint256).notice: Winning team per season (seasonId => teamId+1, 0 = not set)

teamPredictorCount(uint256,uint256).notice: Count of predictors per team (seasonId => teamId => count)

totalPredictions().notice: Total predictions made across all seasons

userPredictions(uint256,address).notice: User predictions per season (seasonId => user => teamId+1, 0 = no prediction)
